title: DDFP 487: Week 1 Red Challenge Flag picks & "10-ft pole" scenarios
itunes:title: DDFP 487: Week 1 Red Challenge Flag picks & "10-ft pole" scenarios
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Matt "Money" Smith to discuss Jared Goff's career outlook, whether or not Andy Dalton will ever win a playoff game and if Tom Brady will win another Super Bowl. Then, the guys make their selections for the biggest games of Week 1 in the 2016 season return of "Red Challenge Flag Picks." Also, Shek brings back the "10-ft pole" segment where Money decides whether or not he would touch bold statements regarding Carson Wentz, RGIII and Tony Romo with an actual 10-ft pole.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
